MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Bagillt affecting properties in Pen Y Glyn, Ridgehill Drive and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:12am. Restoration is taking longer than expected as our team are attempting to reconfigure the network from an underground electricity box, and the team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:24am on 4th February 2021.
